inclusion.criterion: Biopsy-proven invasive adenocarcinoma of the breast
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not pregnant, as demonstrated by a negative serum or urine pregnancy test in women of child bearing potential
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to have a biopsy at the start of study if adequate sample for gene array is not available
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to provide informed consent and have signed an approved consent form that conforms to federal and institutional guidelines
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Need for immediate chemotherapy as determined by the patients' physicians, e.g., present or imminent compromise of vital organs or unacceptable symptoms from the tumor.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known hypersensitivity to valproic acid or its components or peanut allergy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of smoking and alcohol consumption, but no other significant medical conditions mentioned.
